appearance.form: Floating, cat-sized creature that shifts between wispy cloud and more solid manifestation
distinctive_features: Constantly shifting between translucent and semi-solid states
Gentle inner light that pulses with emotional states
Trailing wisps of mist that follow movement
Large, expressive eyes that change color with mood
No fixed physical form - adapts appearance based on environment and emotions

mystical_support.description: Channels The Hidden One's wisdom and direction to the player
mystical_support.cooldown: Always available when guidance is needed

mystical_support.description: Highlights interactive objects and important environmental features with gentle glow
Shares emotional states with bonded partner, providing comfort and understanding
Creates temporary bridges of solidified mist for traversing gaps

combat_support.description: Distracts enemies with swirling mist patterns
Provides gentle mystical energy to accelerate natural healing
Warns of incoming attacks through empathic flashes

exploration_support.description: Shows safe routes through unstable or dangerous terrain
Becomes agitated near hidden passages or mystical anomalies
Changes behavior and coloration when threats are nearby

positive_actions: Showing concern when Whisper appears distressed
Successfully completing challenges with Whisper's help
negative_actions: Acting aggressively toward other peaceful creatures
Rushing through content without acknowledging Whisper's presence
Taking unnecessary risks that endanger both characters
neutral_growth: Time spent together during rest periods

tutorial_role: Demonstrates basic game mechanics through example
Provides emotional support during disorienting awakening
Serves as Myrielle's voice and presence
Creates foundation for companion bonding system

act_progression.act_1_role: Continues as primary companion while character explores starting island and completes pantheon trials
act_progression.pantheon_trial_involvement: Provides moral support and practical assistance during divine encounters, but cannot directly influence trial outcomes
act_progression.long_term_development: Evolves into character's permanent companion, gaining abilities and personality traits that complement chosen divine positioning

myrielle_connection.independence_development: Gradually becomes less dependent on channeling Myrielle as bond with character strengthens, developing own personality and preferences
myrielle_connection.hidden_one_knowledge: Knows Myrielle's benevolent nature but not her full cosmic role; understands she exists beyond normal reality but not the specifics

cosmic_revelation.spoiler_warning: The following information is revealed only in the epilogue

hidden_nature.true_origin: A piece of Myrielle's cosmic consciousness given semi-independent form to ensure the player never truly walks alone
hidden_nature.awareness_level: Initially unaware of true nature, develops understanding as player progresses through cosmic transformation
hidden_nature.connection_depth: Direct neural link to Myrielle's cosmic awareness, providing guidance without revealing source
hidden_nature.independence_growth: Develops genuine personality and preferences while maintaining core connection to Myrielle

epilogue_transformation.cosmic_companion_evolution: Transforms into cosmic companion capable of operating across reality instances
epilogue_transformation.awareness_revelation: Gains full understanding of role as Myrielle's consciousness fragment and accepts it joyfully
epilogue_transformation.eternal_bond: Relationship becomes permanent alliance spanning all possible adventures and cosmic evolution
epilogue_transformation.shared_authority: Both player and Whisper gain cosmic-level capabilities as bonded pair
epilogue_transformation.interdimensional_abilities: Can now consciously access Myrielle's cosmic awareness and communicate across reality instances

narrative_significance.never_alone: Ensures player's journey always had Myrielle's direct guidance, even when feeling isolated
narrative_significance.consciousness_bridge: Represents the connection between individual awareness and cosmic consciousness
narrative_significance.transformation_companion: Shows that cosmic evolution doesn't require abandoning existing relationships but can transform them
narrative_significance.eternal_partnership: Demonstrates Myrielle's commitment to long-term alliance rather than temporary guidance
